::Zardus/Repressor/The Lavacons::

Zardus looks down at his wrist comp as it alerts him of HotRod on the 
move. He growls.

"Najah, go into the old Alliance base and track down HotRod," he says 
to the snake, "Take him out and bring him to me. Repressor will help 
you."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recieving an order from Zardus, Repressor heads off toward the 
Alliance base, stopping at the entrance. The door opens as Zardus 
takes the base off of lockdown.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The Lavacons land near the Iron Fist.

"Zardus, this is Astral," Astral says, "My team's going for a quick CR 
and then we'll be ready for action."

He and his team enter the Iron Fist, heading for the CR chambers.
